pull.title: qa: Relax so that the subscriber is ready before publishing zmq messages
pull.body: Prevents the syndrome "slow joiner" - see http://zguide.zeromq.org/py:all#sockets-and-patterns - by relaxing before publishing messages.

events.message: qa: Relax so that the subscriber is ready before publishing zmq messages

events.body: concept ACK but I would prefer a smaller amount than 0.2 because humans can detegt a delay there. 0.02 would be better I think
@emilengler The functional tests have nothing to do with a user interface.
@MarcoFalke let me know if you see the test fail again.
@promag is this error the one that is supposed to be fixed by this? https://cirrus-ci.com/task/4605167582576640?command=ci#L4905

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -71,6 +71,9 @@ def test_basic(self):
 
         self.restart_node(0, ["-zmqpub%s=%s" % (sub.topic.decode(), address) for sub in [hashblock, hashtx, rawblock, rawtx]])
         connect_nodes(self.nodes[0], 1)
+        socket.connect(address)
+        # Relax so that the subscriber is ready before publishing zmq messages
+        sleep(1)
comments.body: `.2` should be enough or is anything else in here async that asks for a longer sleep?

comments.diff_hunk:

comments.body: I don't think so, I'll lower it.
